short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prompts user to start recording in the Google Meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never forget to record a meeting again with Meeting Recorder. When you host a google meet, you will be prompted to start a recording. If you click yes, the system will start recording with transcription.
